import React,{useState}from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const AddExperience = () => { const [formData,setFormData]=useState({ company:'', title:'', location:'', from:'', to:'', current:false, description:'' }); const {company,title,location,from,to,current,description}=formData; const onChange=(e)=>{ setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}); } return (

Add An Experience

Add any developer/programming positions that you have had in the past

* = required field

From Date

setFormData({...formData,current:!current})}/> Current Job

To Date

Go Back
) } export default AddExperience
